thread.title: Real Madrid full back Danilo shows off gruesome leg injury | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Real Madrid full back Danilo shows off gruesome leg injury | Daily Mail Online

author: Spencer Morgan For Mailonline
title: Real Madrid full back Danilo shows off gruesome leg injury | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Real Madrid full back Danilo has taken to social media to show off the effects of the the challenge that forced him to be taken off during Saturday's 3-1 win at Osasuna. The Brazilian was left lying in agony after David Garcia had involuntarily stamped on his ankle on the hour mark of the La Liga clash. And he had to be helped off the field as he was replaced by James Rodriguez at the El Sadar Stadium. Danilo shared this image of his wounds on his Snapchat account on Sunday Danilo (left) in action for Real Madrid against Celta Vigo in the Copa del Rey in January Danilo took to his Snapchat account to share a photo of his badly cut left leg with a series of tool-based emoticons. Fortunately for Los Blancos, the 25-year-old has managed to avoid any serious injury and could be deemed fit for selection for the club's Champions League last-16 showdown with Napoli on Wednesday. Zinedine Zidane's men have been in fine form so far this term, with Saturday's victory giving them a one-point lead in La Liga with two games in hand. RELATED ARTICLES
